record_types.name: AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: Synced Record For Evaluation Vendor Address

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Address Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Vendor Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationVendorId,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationVendorId], ""),
      align: "END"

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor City",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(

      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState], ""),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Country",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry], ""),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Zip Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Zip Code Ext",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Foreign Postal Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
        "",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]),
        "",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendorAddress_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: false
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_DRM_BL_handleBusinessTypeForEvalVendor
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to handle the business type data construction logic for eval vendors

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_APPREF_GSM_GETDATA_doesVendorExist
called_by: AS GSS Update Vendor With GSM SLG

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateVendorWithAdditionalInfoFromSuite
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to update the vendors with additional info such as Doing business as and Business types from Suite. This is done when a vendor is added to an evaluation.
called_by: AS GSS Update Vendor With GSM SLG

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BL_mapVendorDataForGSMCreation
expression_rules.description: Rule to construct evaluation vendor data to GSM format

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isStateOrLocal: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  if(
    local!isStateOrLocal,
    a!map(
      vendorLegalName: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
      isActive: ri!isActiveInSource,
      tin: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin],
      fein: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein],
      vin: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vin],
      doingBusinessAs: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName],
      registrationExpirationDate: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
      business: a!map(
        businessTypeMapping: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessTypes.typeCode],
            expression: a!map(
              businessTypeRefId: fv!item,
              isDeleted: false()
            )
          )

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord
expression_rules.description: Given a model record, updates the provided records' fields to match those of the model record.  Nulls apply if the field exists in the model record.
